mapper.select: SELECT count(*) cnt FROM member WHERE mid = #{mid} AND mpw = #{mpw}
mapper.sql:
SELECT rno ,mno , mid , mname , issue , joindate , joindate jointime FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rno , mno , mid , mname , issue , joindate FROM (SELECT mno , mid , mname , issue , joindate
FROM member ORDER BY mno desc ) ) WHERE rno BETWEEN 1 AND 10
